description: Sendan is the leader of http://anidb.net/ch10263 [Kaoru]`s pack of Inukami. She seems strict and demanding, but appears so because she seems to have the wellbeing of her contractor and master at heart at all times. Only perfect service is good enough for `Kaoru-sama`. Sendan is the younger sister of http://anidb.net/ch10266 [Hake], the male Inukami that serves http://anidb.net/ch10300 [the head of the Kawahira family]. Like her older brother, she always carries around a fan.
name: Sendan
